name: Expeditious! (A fast paced adventure. IN SAPCE!)
name_original: Expeditious! (A fast paced adventure. IN SAPCE!)
description:
You are on a crappy rocket with limited steering and broken breaks. All you have left are your wits, your ace pilot skills and the drive to finish your mission!  Attempt to make it through a perilous asteroid field!

This is very much a "baby's first game dev attempt" so don't expect much. The rocket is something I modeled myself, everything else has been raided from the free assets of Unity Assets Store. More in-depth credits to come! This is the result of  amazing tutelage from our amazing instructors at Riveria, a lot of youtube coding tutorials to supplement what has yet to be taught, and a lot of no sleep and a lot of caffeine.
